content:
In case this affects you: it seems there is a train strike announced for today, until 9pm:
https://www.italiarail.com/strike-information

If you have a "Trenitalia" train, here in this page (on Chrome just turn on "Translate" for the English version) you can find a pdf with trains that are guaranteed to run on schedule (but expect delays anyway):

https://www.trenitalia.com/it/informazioni/treni-garantiti-incasodisciopero.html
For information: the Marconi Express (the fast automated train to the airport) is also stopped today.
